lead_paragraph: Austin P. Berglas is leaving the F.B.I. to join K2 Intelligence, a corporate investigations company.

headline.print_headline: New Job for F.B.I. Agent Who Supervised JPMorgan Breach Case
headline.main: Agent Who Supervised Investigation of JPMorgan Cyberattack Takes a New Job

snippet: Austin P. Berglas is leaving the F.B.I. to join K2 Intelligence, a corporate investigations company.
abstract: K2 Intelligence is expected to announce hiring of Austin P Berglas, FBI veteran of 16 years who is overseeing investigation into JPMorgan Chase hacking attack in 2014.
